org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching

Class StressTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.TestBase
        • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching.MatchTestCore
          • org.apache.river.test.impl.outrigger.matching.StressTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StressTestInterleaved, StressTestInterleavedWithShutdown, StressTestWithShutdown

    public class StressTest
extends MatchTestCore
    Stress test class. This class can run multiple, concurrent read/take and write threads. The user is able to configure the number of entries written as well as the number of read and write tasks. Note: This test does not use an audited space like MatchTestBase.

    • Field Detail

      • timingStats

        protected volatile boolean timingStats
        If set, compute timing statistics for reads, takes, and and write operations. Not valid until construct() is called.

      • verifyingTakes

        protected volatile boolean verifyingTakes
        If set, verify each take operation with a subsequent read operation. That is, try reading an entry after it was taken in order to verify that the take took place. Not valid until construct() is called.

      • WriteRandomEntryTaskOK

        protected volatile boolean WriteRandomEntryTaskOK
        fields which are added during porting for correct failure messages

        protected volatile String WriteRandomEntryTaskMSG

        protected volatile String ReadAndTakeEntryTaskMSG

      • StressTest

        public StressTest()

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        protected void parse()
              throws Exception
        Method called for parsing command line arguments. Accepted options are:
        -interleave
        Sets interleaving to true. All read and write operations will run concurrently. Otherwise, read operations are scheduled after all write operations have completed. Defaults to false.
        -num_entries int
        The total number of entries to be written to the space. Defaults to 1000.
        -num_readers int
        The total number of reader tasks to schedule. Defaults to 1.
        -num_writers int
        The total number of writer tasks to schedule. Defaults to 1.
        -timing_stats
        Enables the collection of timing statistics. Defaults to false.
        -verify_takes
        Enables take verification via a subsequent read operation on the same entry. Defaults to false.
        Overrides:
        parse in class MatchTestCore
        Throws:
        Exception

      • construct

        public Test construct(QAConfig config)
               throws Exception
        Method for initializing test environment. Sets up a TaskManager with enough threads to run all tasks concurrently as well as requesting a space to be started.
        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Overrides:
        construct in class MatchTestCore
        Parameters:
        config - Arguments from the runner for construct.
        Returns:
        Test to run.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • run

        public void run()
         throws Exception
        Method that runs the stress test. It consists of:
        • Creating numWriters write tasks and evenly allocate a number of write requests to each one.
        • Creating numReaders read tasks and evenly allocate a number of read requests to each one.
        If any task fails, it will call the failed method with the appropriate message. Otherwise, the program will exit normally.
        Throws:
        Exception - if the test fails for any reason
        See Also:
        failed(java.lang.String, java.lang.Throwable)
